description:
Installation of new telecommunication cabinet . This application may affect the character and appearance of the conservation area. 
 Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); section 73.
decision_conditions: The proposed location of the cabinet in such a prominent position adjacent to an area of low level landscaping fails to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the Canonbury Conservation Area and is contrary to policies C17 Telecommunications equipment, D1 Overall design, D4 Designing in context of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002 and the guidance contained in the Islington Conservation Area Design Guidelines 2002.
